snippet: Representative Laura Richardson, Democrat of California, has agreed to be punished by the House and to pay a $10,000 fine for compelling her Congressional staff members to work on her 2010 campaign.
abstract: Rep Laura Richardson of California agrees to be reprimanded by the House and pay a $10,000 fine for compelling her Congressional staff members to work on her 2010 campaign; punishment was recommended by the House Ethics Committee in a biting report.
lead_paragraph: Representative Laura Richardson, Democrat of California, has agreed to be punished by the House and to pay a $10,000 fine for compelling her Congressional staff members to work on her 2010 campaign.

headline.seo: Representative Laura Richardson Reprimanded by House
headline.main: Democrat Reprimanded for Misusing Staff in Race
headline.print_headline: Democrat Reprimanded For Misusing Staff in Race
